sentences.en: A 10 percent service charge is added in lieu of tipping.
sentences.cn: 加收了10%的服务费以代替小费。

sentences.en: A few years ago Bacryl took charge of the company.
sentences.cn: 几年前，巴克里尔接管了该公司。

sentences.en: All the ferries carry bicycles free or for a nominal charge.
sentences.cn: 所有的渡船都免费或以极低的收费运载自行车。

sentences.en: an admission charge of 5
sentences.cn: 五美元的入场费

sentences.en: Another scalper said he'd charge $1000 for a $125 ticket.
sentences.cn: 另一个票贩子说125美元的票他要价1,000美元。

sentences.en: But legal experts are not sure if such a charge can stick.
sentences.cn: 但法律专家们不能肯定这一指控是否成立。

sentences.en: Customers who arrange overdrafts will face a monthly charge of £5.
sentences.cn: 透支的客户每月要缴纳5英镑的费用。

sentences.en: Det Supt Bassett was in charge of the murder enquiry.
sentences.cn: 探长巴西特负责调查该谋杀案。

sentences.en: Even local nurseries charge $150 a week.
sentences.cn: 即便当地的托儿所每周也要收$150的费用。

sentences.en: Gibbons has been charged with murder.
sentences.cn: 吉本斯被指控谋杀。

sentences.en: Guided tours are provided at no charge .
sentences.cn: 免费提供有导游带队的观光游览。

sentences.en: He appeared at Manchester Crown Court on Thursday on a drink-driving charge.
sentences.cn: 他因被控醉酒驾车而于周四在曼彻斯特的刑事法庭受审。

sentences.en: He has admitted the charge and will be sentenced later.
sentences.cn: 他已经认罪，会在晚些时候宣判。

sentences.en: Leave the battery on charge all night.
sentences.cn: 让电池充一晚上的电

sentences.en: Most restaurants add a 10 per cent service charge.
sentences.cn: 大多数餐馆加收10％的服务费。

sentences.en: Owens came in and took charge of (= took control of ) the situation.
sentences.cn: 欧文斯进来控制了局面。

sentences.en: Please charge your glasses and drink a toast to the bride and groom!
sentences.cn: 请各位斟满酒杯向新娘、新郎敬酒！

sentences.en: Police officers on the case are reckoning to charge someone very shortly.
sentences.cn: 调查这个案子的警官正在考虑尽快起诉嫌疑人。

sentences.en: She refused to testify, unless the murder charge against her was dropped.
sentences.cn: 除非撤销对她的谋杀指控，否则她拒绝作证。

sentences.en: the candidate must &B{take charge of} an actual flight.
sentences.cn: 应试者必须负责一次真正的飞行。

sentences.en: The choice will be between a flat-rate or a banded charge.
sentences.cn: 将在统一费用和分级费用之间作出选择。

sentences.en: The hotel charges $125 a night.
sentences.cn: 这家宾馆一晚收费125美元。

sentences.en: The restaurant charged us £40 for the wine.
sentences.cn: 这家餐厅收我们40英镑的酒水钱。

sentences.en: the security agent in charge at the airport.
sentences.cn: 机场保安部的负责人

sentences.en: The shaver can be charged up.
sentences.cn: 这把剃须刀是可充电的。

sentences.en: They have the evidence to charge him.
sentences.cn: 他们有证据来指控他。

sentences.en: We will be pleased to delete the charge from the original invoice.
sentences.cn: 我们决定将这笔费用从原始发票上删去。

sentences.en: We'll put together a proposal, including detailed costings, free of charge.
sentences.cn: 我们将免费拟一份提案，其中包括详细的成本估算。

sentences.en: You're in charge of making the salad.
sentences.cn: 你负责做沙拉

sentences.en: Your order will be sent free of charge (= with no cost ) .
sentences.cn: 你订的货物将免费运送。

words.tran_cn: 应支付的；可以控诉的；可充电的；应课税的
充电器；军马；袭击者；委托者；控诉者
[会计]费用；电荷；掌管；[法]控告；命令；[电]负载
[电]充电；[法]控告；索价；向前冲；记在账上

phrases.tran_cn: &I{【多用于英国】} 被捕的，在押的
管理，负责：具有对…的控制或责任的

phrases.phrase: put someone on a charge of something

phrases.tran_cn: 逮捕；负责照料；引为己责

trans.tran_cn: 收费，指控，负责，管理，被照管的人，电荷，火药
trans.tran_en: the amount of money you have to pay for goods or services

trans.tran_cn: 收费，把…记在账上，指控，谴责，猛冲，赋予…职责，给…充电
trans.tran_en: to say publicly that you think someone has done something wrong

trans.tran_cn: 收费， 要价； 冲锋， 向前冲
trans.tran_en: to deliberately run or walk somewhere quickly

trans.tran_cn: 索，要…支付；控告，指责；使充电，使充满
trans.tran_en: to state officially that someone may be guilty of a crime
